channel.title: Player vs Player combat is messed up [Delta]
channel.description:
Hey Guys i kinda fucked up with my attack pvp boolean (i think)
Well anyways now the only way to attack another player is if you click on them, (then you get skulled) but dont attack and they have to click you back!
Can you guys help via teamviewer or skype?
Please Can you help me i havent been able to fix this though i have been working on it for ages!

item.title: Player vs Player combat is messed up [Delta]

item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Turn auto retaliate on rofl! then youll attack back automatically.

Read full topic
